languages.text: {n}Солдат бледнеет еще сильнее.{/n} "Не серчайте, Ваша Светлость! Я... один остался... страшно было, пока вас дождался. Вот и..."
{n}The soldier grows paler still.{/n} "Please forgive me, Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship! I... was left all alone... and it's been scary, waiting for you. That's why..."
languages.original_text: {n}Солдат бледнеет еще сильнее.{/n} "Не серчайте, Ваша Светлость! Я... один остался... страшно было, пока вас дождался. Вот и..."

traits.locale_text: {n}The soldier grows paler yet.{/n} "Don't get angry, Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship, pleasure understand! I... was left all alone... and it's been scary, waiting for you. That's why..."
{n}The soldier grows paler yet.{/n} "Don't get angry, Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship, pleasure understand! I... was left all alone... and it's been scary, waiting for you. That's why..."
{n}The soldier grows paler yet.{/n} "Please forgive me, Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship! I... was left all alone... and it's been scary, waiting for you. That's why..."

{n}The soldier grows paler still.{/n} "Please forgive me, Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship! I... was left all alone... and it's been scary, waiting for you. That's why..."
{n}The soldier grows paler still.{/n} "Please forgive me, Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship! I... was left all alone... and it's been scary, waiting for you. That's why..."

languages.text: {n}Der Soldat wird noch blasser.{/n} "Bitte verzeiht mir, Euer {mf|Lord|Lady}schaft! Ich ... war ganz allein ... und ich hatte Angst, während ich auf Euch warten musste. Daher ..."
languages.original_text: {n}The soldier grows paler still.{/n} "Please forgive me, Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship! I... was left all alone... and it's been scary, waiting for you. That's why..."

traits.locale_text: {n}Der Soldat wird noch blasser.{/n} "Bitte verzeiht mir, Euer {mf|Lord|Lady}schaft! Ich ... war ganz allein ... und ich hatte Angst, während ich auf Euch warten musste. Daher ..."

languages.text: {n}Le soldat pâlit encore un peu plus.{/n} « Je vous prie de me pardonner, Votre Seigneurie. Je... je me suis retrouvé tout seul et... c'était effrayant de vous attendre. C'est pour ça... »
languages.original_text: {n}The soldier grows paler still.{/n} "Please forgive me, Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship! I... was left all alone... and it's been scary, waiting for you. That's why..."

traits.locale_text: {n}Le soldat pâlit encore un peu plus.{/n} « Je vous prie de me pardonner, Votre Seigneurie. Je... je me suis retrouvé tout seul et... c'était effrayant de vous attendre. C'est pour ça... »

languages.text: {n}士兵的脸色变得更白了。{/n}“请原谅我，大人！我……只剩我一个人了……周围一切都很可怕，而我一直在等您。所以我才……”
languages.original_text: {n}The soldier grows paler still.{/n} "Please forgive me, Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship! I... was left all alone... and it's been scary, waiting for you. That's why..."

traits.locale_text: {n}士兵的脸色变得更白了。{/n}“请原谅我，大人！我……只剩我一个人了……周围一切都很可怕，而我一直在等您。所以我才……”

languages.text: {n}兵士はさらに青白くなった。{/n}「お許しを願います、{mf|陛下|陛下}！私は…一人きりになり…あなたを待つことが怖かったんです。だから…」
languages.original_text: {n}The soldier grows paler still.{/n} "Please forgive me, Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship! I... was left all alone... and it's been scary, waiting for you. That's why..."

traits.locale_text: {n}兵士はさらに青白くなった。{/n}「お許しを願います、{mf|陛下|陛下}！私は…一人きりになり…あなたを待つことが怖かったんです。だから…」

languages.text: {n}El soldado palidece aún más.{/n} «¡Perdóneme, mi{mf|lord|lady}! Yo... me abandonaron... y ha sido aterrador esperar. Por eso...».
languages.original_text: {n}The soldier grows paler still.{/n} "Please forgive me, Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship! I... was left all alone... and it's been scary, waiting for you. That's why..."

traits.locale_text: {n}El soldado palidece aún más.{/n}«¡Perdóneme, mi{mf|lord|lady}!». Yo... me abandonaron... y ha sido aterrador esperar. Por eso...».

languages.text: {n}Askerin benzi daha da atıyor.{/n} "Lütfen beni affedin {mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri! Ben... Yapayalnız kalmıştım ve... Sizi beklerken çok korktuğum için..."
languages.original_text: {n}The soldier grows paler still.{/n} "Please forgive me, Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship! I... was left all alone... and it's been scary, waiting for you. That's why..."
